ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You can't hold breath with your head crippled!"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You can't hold breath with your torso crippled!
ESP.TRADUIT: Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你不能在躯干伤残的时候屏息！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You can't hold breath with your torso crippled!"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You don't have the strength to steady this weapon!
ESP.TRADUIT: Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你没有足够的力量来拿稳这把武器！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You don't have the strength to steady this weapon!"

ESP.ORIGINAL: Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You don't have the skill to steady this weapon!
ESP.TRADUIT: Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你片面的武器技巧让你没法拿稳这把武器！
ESP.COMMENTAIRE: MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You don't have the skill to steady this weapon!"

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn JHBOnKeyDownEventHandler
int iKey
ref rWeapon
float fDrainMult
short iReq
begin function {iKey}
if eval (IsControlPressed 6 == 0) && (GetLeftTrigger == 0) if JHBModeOut == 0 return endif elseif GetPCUsingScope == 0 if JHBModeSighting == 0 return endif else if JHBModeScope == 0 return endif endif
if JHBEnabled == 0 return elseif MenuMode return elseif JHB.iHoldBreath if JHBToggle JHB.iDisable = 1 endif return elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV PerceptionCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You can't hold breath with your head crippled!" return elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV EnduranceCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You can't hold breath with your torso crippled!" return elseif PlayerRef.GetAV ActionPoints <= 0 return elseif PlayerRef.IsInWater return elseif PlayerRef.GetAnimAction == 13 return elseif PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt JHBEffect return endif
rWeapon = PlayerRef.GetEquippedObject 5
if eval JHBRequirements == 1 || JHBRequirements == 3
iReq = GetWeaponRequiredStrength rWeapon iReq = iReq - PlayerRef.GetPerkModifier 53 0 rWeapon
if PlayerRef.GetAV Strength < iReq MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You don't have the strength to steady this weapon!" return endif
endif
iReq = (PlayerRef.GetAVAlt (GetWeaponSkill rWeapon)) - GetWeaponRequiredSkill rWeapon
if eval JHBRequirements == 2 || JHBRequirements == 3
if iReq < 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You don't have the skill to steady this weapon!" return endif
endif
if iReq < 0 iReq = 4 * iReq endif
if JHBSounds PlayerRef.Say PLAYERLEAVESIRONSIGHTS endif
if JHBAPRegen == 0 SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 1 0 endif SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 0 JHBSpreadMultiplier
fDrainMult = ( 1 - 0.1 * JHBEnduranceBuff * (PlayerRef.GetAV Endurance - 1)) * ( 1 - 0.01 * iReq) ; AP SetNthEffectTraitNumeric JHBEffect 1 0 (fDrainMult * JHBAPDrainMax) SetNthEffectTraitNumeric JHBEffect 2 0 (fDrainMult * (2 * JHBAPDrainMax + JHBAPDrainMin) / 3) SetNthEffectTraitNumeric JHBEffect 3 0 (fDrainMult * (JHBAPDrainMax + 2 * JHBAPDrainMin) / 3) SetNthEffectTraitNumeric JHBEffect 4 0 (fDrainMult * JHBAPDrainMin)
PlayerRef.CIOS JHBEffect PlayerRef.AddPerk JHBPerk JHB.iHoldBreath = 1
PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableSetFloat "*_JHBComm" 1 0 DispatchEvent "JHBStateChange" end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn JHBOnKeyDownEventHandler
int iKey
ref rWeapon
float fDrainMult
short iReq
begin function {iKey}
if eval (IsControlPressed 6 == 0) && (GetLeftTrigger == 0) if JHBModeOut == 0 return endif elseif GetPCUsingScope == 0 if JHBModeSighting == 0 return endif else if JHBModeScope == 0 return endif endif
if JHBEnabled == 0 return elseif MenuMode return elseif JHB.iHoldBreath if JHBToggle JHB.iDisable = 1 endif return elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV PerceptionCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你不能在头部伤残的时候屏息！" return elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV EnduranceCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你不能在躯干伤残的时候屏息！" return elseif PlayerRef.GetAV ActionPoints <= 0 return elseif PlayerRef.IsInWater return elseif PlayerRef.GetAnimAction == 13 return elseif PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt JHBEffect return endif
rWeapon = PlayerRef.GetEquippedObject 5
if eval JHBRequirements == 1 || JHBRequirements == 3
iReq = GetWeaponRequiredStrength rWeapon iReq = iReq - PlayerRef.GetPerkModifier 53 0 rWeapon
if PlayerRef.GetAV Strength < iReq MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你没有足够的力量来拿稳这把武器！" return endif
endif
iReq = (PlayerRef.GetAVAlt (GetWeaponSkill rWeapon)) - GetWeaponRequiredSkill rWeapon
if eval JHBRequirements == 2 || JHBRequirements == 3
if iReq < 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你片面的武器技巧让你没法拿稳这把武器！" return endif
endif
if iReq < 0 iReq = 4 * iReq endif
if JHBSounds PlayerRef.Say PLAYERLEAVESIRONSIGHTS endif
if JHBAPRegen == 0 SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 1 0 endif SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 0 JHBSpreadMultiplier
fDrainMult = ( 1 - 0.1 * JHBEnduranceBuff * (PlayerRef.GetAV Endurance - 1)) * ( 1 - 0.01 * iReq) ; AP SetNthEffectTraitNumeric JHBEffect 1 0 (fDrainMult * JHBAPDrainMax) SetNthEffectTraitNumeric JHBEffect 2 0 (fDrainMult * (2 * JHBAPDrainMax + JHBAPDrainMin) / 3) SetNthEffectTraitNumeric JHBEffect 3 0 (fDrainMult * (JHBAPDrainMax + 2 * JHBAPDrainMin) / 3) SetNthEffectTraitNumeric JHBEffect 4 0 (fDrainMult * JHBAPDrainMin)
PlayerRef.CIOS JHBEffect PlayerRef.AddPerk JHBPerk JHB.iHoldBreath = 1
PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableSetFloat "*_JHBComm" 1 0 DispatchEvent "JHBStateChange" end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn JHBMainLoopEventHandler
short iStop
begin function {}
if MenuMode return endif
if GetController == 0 elseif IsButtonPressed JHBButton == 0 JHB.iControllerLock = 0 elseif JHB.iControllerLock == 0 call JHBOnKeyDownEventHandler JHBKey JHB.iControllerLock = 1 endif
if JHBShowMessage == 0 elseif (IsControlPressed 6) == 0 elseif JHB.iMessage SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/visible" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/visible" 1 elseif eval (GetPCUsingScope && JHBModeScope) || (GetPCUsingScope == 0 && JHBModeSighting) if IsComponentLoaded "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap" SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/justify_center_hotrect/visible" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/justify_center_hotrect/systemcolor" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/justify_center_hotrect/PCShortcutLabel/systemcolor" 1 SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/justify_center_hotrect/_PCButtonText" "%k)" JHBKey SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/justify_center_hotrect/string" "Hold Breath" SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/justify_center_text/visible" 0 SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/justify_center_text:1/string" "%e" SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/justify_center_text:2/string" "%e" SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/InfoWrap/Info/visible" 1 else SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/justify_center_hotrect/visible" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/justify_center_hotrect/systemcolor" 1 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/justify_center_hotrect/PCShortcutLabel/systemcolor" 1 SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/justify_center_hotrect/_PCButtonText" "%k)" JHBKey SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/justify_center_hotrect/string" "Hold Breath" SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/justify_center_text/visible" 0 SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/justify_center_text:1/string" "%e" SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/justify_center_text:2/string" "%e" SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/Info/visible" 1 endif endif
if JHB.iHoldBreath == 0
if PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt JHBEffect PlayerRef.Dispel JHBEffect endif
if JHB.iAPRegen == 1 JHB.iAPRegen = 0 SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 0 1 if 0 == PlayerRef.GetPerkModifier 39 1 Weap10mmPistol Player.RemovePerk JHBPerk JHB.iAPRegen = 2 endif elseif JHB.iAPRegen == 2 Player.AddPerk JHBPerk JHB.iAPRegen = 0 endif
return endif
iStop = 1
if Player.GetAV ActionPoints <= 0 elseif JHB.iDisable JHB.iDisable = 0 elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV PerceptionCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV EnduranceCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 elseif Player.IsInWater elseif eval (IsControlPressed 6 == 0) && (GetLeftTrigger == 0) && (JHBModeOut == 0) elseif eval (GetPCUsingScope == 0) && (JHBModeSighting == 0) elseif JHBModeScope == 0 elseif JHBToggle iStop = 0 elseif eval IsKeyPressed JHBKey == 0 && IsButtonPressed JHBButton == 0 else iStop = 0 endif
if iStop == 0 return endif
if Player.GetAV ActionPoints <= 0 if JHBSounds PlayerRef.Say PLAYERENTERSIRONSIGHTS endif endif if eval Player.GetAV PerceptionCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You can't hold breath with your head crippled!" elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV EnduranceCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|You can't hold breath with your torso crippled!" endif
JHB.iHoldBreath = 0
SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 1 1 SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 0 1
PlayerRef.Dispel JHBEffect if JHBAPRegen == 0 JHB.iAPRegen = 1 endif
PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableSetFloat "*_JHBComm" 0 0 DispatchEvent "JHBStateChange"
end

begin function {}
if MenuMode return endif
if GetController == 0 elseif IsButtonPressed JHBButton == 0 JHB.iControllerLock = 0 elseif JHB.iControllerLock == 0 call JHBOnKeyDownEventHandler JHBKey JHB.iControllerLock = 1 endif

if JHB.iHoldBreath == 0
if PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt JHBEffect PlayerRef.Dispel JHBEffect endif
if JHB.iAPRegen == 1 JHB.iAPRegen = 0 SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 0 1 if 0 == PlayerRef.GetPerkModifier 39 1 Weap10mmPistol Player.RemovePerk JHBPerk JHB.iAPRegen = 2 endif elseif JHB.iAPRegen == 2 Player.AddPerk JHBPerk JHB.iAPRegen = 0 endif
return endif
iStop = 1
if Player.GetAV ActionPoints <= 0 elseif JHB.iDisable JHB.iDisable = 0 elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV PerceptionCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV EnduranceCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 elseif Player.IsInWater elseif eval (IsControlPressed 6 == 0) && (GetLeftTrigger == 0) && (JHBModeOut == 0) elseif eval (GetPCUsingScope == 0) && (JHBModeSighting == 0) elseif JHBModeScope == 0 elseif JHBToggle iStop = 0 elseif eval IsKeyPressed JHBKey == 0 && IsButtonPressed JHBButton == 0 else iStop = 0 endif
if iStop == 0 return endif
if Player.GetAV ActionPoints <= 0 if JHBSounds PlayerRef.Say PLAYERENTERSIRONSIGHTS endif endif if eval Player.GetAV PerceptionCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你无法在头部伤残的时候屏息！" elseif eval PlayerRef.GetAV EnduranceCondition <= 0 && PlayerRef.IsSpellTargetAlt Jet == 0 MessageExAlt 4 "Interface\Icons\Message Icons\glow_message_vaultboy_sad.dds|你无法在躯干伤残的时候屏息！" endif
JHB.iHoldBreath = 0
SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 1 1 SetNthPerkEntryValue1 JHBPerk 0 1
PlayerRef.Dispel JHBEffect if JHBAPRegen == 0 JHB.iAPRegen = 1 endif
PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableSetFloat "*_JHBComm" 0 0 DispatchEvent "JHBStateChange"
end

ESP.ORIGINAL:
scn JVOMainLoopEventHandler
short iMode short iVisible
short iIndex
ref rTarget ref rReference
short iTemp short iInFocus short iInDistance
float fDistance
string_var sTemp
short iTargets array_var aTemp array_var aTargets array_var aReferences
begin function {}
if eval JVOToggle || IsKeyPressed JVOKey 2 else JVO.iObjectives = 0 endif
if eval JVO.iObjectives == 0 || JVOEnabled == 0 iVisible = 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/JVO/_JVOVisible" 0 return elseif eval (IsControlPressed 6 == 0) && (GetLeftTrigger == 0) iVisible = 1 iMode = JVOModeOut elseif GetPCUsingScope == 0 iVisible = 1 iMode = JVOModeSighting else iVisible = -1 iMode = JVOModeScope endif
if iMode == 0 iVisible = 0 endif
SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/JVO/_JVOVisible" iVisible
if iVisible == 0 return endif
if MenuMode return endif
if PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetType "*_JVOOffset" 0 JVO.fOffsetHUDMarker = PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetFloat "*_JVOOffset" 0 else JVO.fOffsetHUDMarker = 0 endif SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\_JVOOffsetMarker" JVO.fOffsetHUDMarker
if PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetType "*_JVOOffset" 1 JVO.fOffsetHUDText = PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetFloat "*_JVOOffset" 1 else JVO.fOffsetHUDText = 0 endif SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\_JVOOffsetText" JVO.fOffsetHUDText
if PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetType "*_JVOOffset" 2 JVO.fOffsetWorld = PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetFloat "*_JVOOffset" 2 else JVO.fOffsetWorld = 20 endif
JVO.aObjectives = GetCurrentQuestObjectiveTeleportLinks
iTargets = ar_size JVO.aObjectives
while JVO.iTargets < iTargets if JVO.iTargets == 0 AddTileFromTemplate "HUDMainMenu\JVO|JVOTemp|JVORect" endif AddTileFromTemplate "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect|JVOMarker|JVOMarker%g" JVO.iTargets JVO.iTargets += 1 loop
while JVO.iTargets > iTargets JVO.iTargets -= 1 UnloadUIComponent ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $JVO.iTargets) if JVO.iTargets == 0 UnloadUIComponent "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect" endif loop
aTargets = Ar_Construct "array" aReferences = Ar_Construct "array"
iIndex = 0
while iIndex < iTargets if eval (TypeOf JVO.aObjectives[iIndex]) == "Array" aTemp = JVO.aObjectives[iIndex] else iIndex = iTargets continue endif
if eval aTemp == Ar_Null iIndex = iTargets continue endif
if IsFormValid (aTemp[0]) Ar_Append aTargets (aTemp[0]) endif
iTemp = -1 + ar_size aTemp
if IsFormValid (aTemp[iTemp]) Ar_Append aReferences (aTemp[iTemp]) endif
iIndex += 1 loop
JVO.aTargets = Ar_Copy aTargets JVO.aReferences = Ar_Copy aReferences
SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/JVO/_JVOInCombat" (PlayerRef.IsInCombat)
if JVOAlpha == 0 iTemp = GetUIFloat "HUDMainMenu/HitPoints/compass_window/alpha" if iTemp == -999 iTemp = GetUIFloat "HUDMainMenu/HP_Wrap/HitPoints/compass_window/alpha" endif SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/JVO/_JVOAlphaCW" iTemp endif
JVO.rTarget = GetCustomMapMarker
if IsReference (JVO.rTarget) fDistance = PlayerRef.GetDistance2D (JVO.rTarget)
iInDistance = 1
if fDistance > JVODistanceMax if JVODistanceMax >= 0 iInDistance = 0 endif elseif fDistance < JVODistanceMin if JVODistanceMin >= 0 iInDistance = 0 endif endif
SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVOPlayerMarker\_JVOInDistance" iInDistance
iInFocus = GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVOPlayerMarker\_JVOInFocus"
if iInFocus + JVODistanceHandling > 1 if fDistance > 1000000 sTemp = "Far away" elseif JVODistanceSystem == 0 iTemp = fDistance sTemp = $iTemp + " un." elseif JVODistanceSystem == 1 iTemp = fDistance / 21.333 sTemp = $iTemp + " ft." elseif JVODistanceSystem == 2 iTemp = fDistance / 69.99104 sTemp = $iTemp + " m." endif
SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVOPlayerMarker\_JVODistance" $sTemp endif else JVO.rTarget = 0 endif
if eval JVO.aTargets == Ar_Null return endif
iIndex = 0
while iIndex < JVO.iTargets
if 0 == Ar_HasKey JVO.aTargets iIndex iIndex += 1 continue endif
if 0 == Ar_HasKey JVO.aReferences iIndex iIndex += 1 continue endif
rTarget = JVO.aTargets[iIndex] rReference = JVO.aReferences[iIndex]
if IsReference rTarget == 0 iIndex += 1 continue endif
if JVOHostileColor SetUIFloatAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVOHostile") (rTarget.IsCrimeOrEnemy) endif
fDistance = PlayerRef.GetDistance3D rTarget
iInDistance = 1
if fDistance > JVODistanceMax if JVODistanceMax >= 0 iInDistance = 0 endif elseif fDistance < JVODistanceMin if JVODistanceMin >= 0 iInDistance = 0 endif endif
SetUIFloatAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVOInDistance") iInDistance
iInFocus = GetUIFloatAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVOInFocus")
if iInFocus + JVODistanceHandling > 1 if fDistance > 1000000 sTemp = "Far away" elseif JVODistanceSystem == 0 iTemp = fDistance sTemp = $iTemp + " un." elseif JVODistanceSystem == 1 iTemp = fDistance / 21.333 sTemp = $iTemp + " ft." elseif JVODistanceSystem == 2 iTemp = fDistance / 69.99104 sTemp = $iTemp + " m." endif
SetUIStringAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVODistance") $sTemp endif
if iInFocus + JVOTextHandling > 1 if JVOTextSpoilers == 4 sTemp = $(GetActiveQuest) elseif JVOTextSpoilers == 3 iTemp = GetStage (GetActiveQuest) sTemp = GetObjectiveText (GetActiveQuest) iTemp elseif JVOTextSpoilers == 2 sTemp = $rReference elseif JVOTextSpoilers == 1 sTemp = $rTarget elseif JVOTextSpoilers == 0 if rTarget.HasLoaded3D == 0 if rTarget.IsInInterior sTemp = $(rTarget.GetParentCell) else sTemp = $(rTarget.GetParentWorldspace) endif elseif PlayerRef.GetLineOfSight rTarget == 0 if rTarget.IsInInterior sTemp = $(rTarget.GetParentCell) else sTemp = $(rTarget.GetParentWorldspace) endif else sTemp = $rTarget endif endif if eval sTemp == "<no name>" sTemp = "" endif
SetUIStringAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVOText") $sTemp endif
iIndex += 1
loop
sv_destruct sTemp
end
ESP.TRADUIT:
scn JVOMainLoopEventHandler
short iMode short iVisible
short iIndex
ref rTarget ref rReference
short iTemp short iInFocus short iInDistance
float fDistance
string_var sTemp
short iTargets array_var aTemp array_var aTargets array_var aReferences
begin function {}
if eval JVOToggle || IsKeyPressed JVOKey 2 else JVO.iObjectives = 0 endif
if eval JVO.iObjectives == 0 || JVOEnabled == 0 iVisible = 0 SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/JVO/_JVOVisible" 0 return elseif eval (IsControlPressed 6 == 0) && (GetLeftTrigger == 0) iVisible = 1 iMode = JVOModeOut elseif GetPCUsingScope == 0 iVisible = 1 iMode = JVOModeSighting else iVisible = -1 iMode = JVOModeScope endif
if iMode == 0 iVisible = 0 endif
SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/JVO/_JVOVisible" iVisible
if iVisible == 0 return endif
if MenuMode return endif
if PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetType "*_JVOOffset" 0 JVO.fOffsetHUDMarker = PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetFloat "*_JVOOffset" 0 else JVO.fOffsetHUDMarker = 0 endif SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\_JVOOffsetMarker" JVO.fOffsetHUDMarker
if PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetType "*_JVOOffset" 1 JVO.fOffsetHUDText = PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetFloat "*_JVOOffset" 1 else JVO.fOffsetHUDText = 0 endif SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\_JVOOffsetText" JVO.fOffsetHUDText
if PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetType "*_JVOOffset" 2 JVO.fOffsetWorld = PlayerRef.AuxiliaryVariableGetFloat "*_JVOOffset" 2 else JVO.fOffsetWorld = 20 endif
JVO.aObjectives = GetCurrentQuestObjectiveTeleportLinks
iTargets = ar_size JVO.aObjectives
while JVO.iTargets < iTargets if JVO.iTargets == 0 AddTileFromTemplate "HUDMainMenu\JVO|JVOTemp|JVORect" endif AddTileFromTemplate "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect|JVOMarker|JVOMarker%g" JVO.iTargets JVO.iTargets += 1 loop
while JVO.iTargets > iTargets JVO.iTargets -= 1 UnloadUIComponent ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $JVO.iTargets) if JVO.iTargets == 0 UnloadUIComponent "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect" endif loop
aTargets = Ar_Construct "array" aReferences = Ar_Construct "array"
iIndex = 0
while iIndex < iTargets if eval (TypeOf JVO.aObjectives[iIndex]) == "Array" aTemp = JVO.aObjectives[iIndex] else iIndex = iTargets continue endif
if eval aTemp == Ar_Null iIndex = iTargets continue endif
if IsFormValid (aTemp[0]) Ar_Append aTargets (aTemp[0]) endif
iTemp = -1 + ar_size aTemp
if IsFormValid (aTemp[iTemp]) Ar_Append aReferences (aTemp[iTemp]) endif
iIndex += 1 loop
JVO.aTargets = Ar_Copy aTargets JVO.aReferences = Ar_Copy aReferences
SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/JVO/_JVOInCombat" (PlayerRef.IsInCombat)
if JVOAlpha == 0 iTemp = GetUIFloat "HUDMainMenu/HitPoints/compass_window/alpha" if iTemp == -999 iTemp = GetUIFloat "HUDMainMenu/HP_Wrap/HitPoints/compass_window/alpha" endif SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu/JVO/_JVOAlphaCW" iTemp endif
JVO.rTarget = GetCustomMapMarker
if IsReference (JVO.rTarget) fDistance = PlayerRef.GetDistance2D (JVO.rTarget)
iInDistance = 1
if fDistance > JVODistanceMax if JVODistanceMax >= 0 iInDistance = 0 endif elseif fDistance < JVODistanceMin if JVODistanceMin >= 0 iInDistance = 0 endif endif
SetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVOPlayerMarker\_JVOInDistance" iInDistance
iInFocus = GetUIFloatAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVOPlayerMarker\_JVOInFocus"
if iInFocus + JVODistanceHandling > 1 if fDistance > 1000000 sTemp = "远方" elseif JVODistanceSystem == 0 iTemp = fDistance sTemp = $iTemp + " 单位" elseif JVODistanceSystem == 1 iTemp = fDistance / 21.333 sTemp = $iTemp + " 英尺" elseif JVODistanceSystem == 2 iTemp = fDistance / 69.99104 sTemp = $iTemp + " 米" endif
SetUIStringAlt "HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVOPlayerMarker\_JVODistance" $sTemp endif else JVO.rTarget = 0 endif
if eval JVO.aTargets == Ar_Null return endif
iIndex = 0
while iIndex < JVO.iTargets
if 0 == Ar_HasKey JVO.aTargets iIndex iIndex += 1 continue endif
if 0 == Ar_HasKey JVO.aReferences iIndex iIndex += 1 continue endif
rTarget = JVO.aTargets[iIndex] rReference = JVO.aReferences[iIndex]
if IsReference rTarget == 0 iIndex += 1 continue endif
if JVOHostileColor SetUIFloatAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVOHostile") (rTarget.IsCrimeOrEnemy) endif
fDistance = PlayerRef.GetDistance3D rTarget
iInDistance = 1
if fDistance > JVODistanceMax if JVODistanceMax >= 0 iInDistance = 0 endif elseif fDistance < JVODistanceMin if JVODistanceMin >= 0 iInDistance = 0 endif endif
SetUIFloatAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVOInDistance") iInDistance
iInFocus = GetUIFloatAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVOInFocus")
if iInFocus + JVODistanceHandling > 1 if fDistance > 1000000 sTemp = "远方" elseif JVODistanceSystem == 0 iTemp = fDistance sTemp = $iTemp + " 单位" elseif JVODistanceSystem == 1 iTemp = fDistance / 21.333 sTemp = $iTemp + " 英尺" elseif JVODistanceSystem == 2 iTemp = fDistance / 69.99104 sTemp = $iTemp + " 米" endif
SetUIStringAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVODistance") $sTemp endif
if iInFocus + JVOTextHandling > 1 if JVOTextSpoilers == 4 sTemp = $(GetActiveQuest) elseif JVOTextSpoilers == 3 iTemp = GetStage (GetActiveQuest) sTemp = GetObjectiveText (GetActiveQuest) iTemp elseif JVOTextSpoilers == 2 sTemp = $rReference elseif JVOTextSpoilers == 1 sTemp = $rTarget elseif JVOTextSpoilers == 0 if rTarget.HasLoaded3D == 0 if rTarget.IsInInterior sTemp = $(rTarget.GetParentCell) else sTemp = $(rTarget.GetParentWorldspace) endif elseif PlayerRef.GetLineOfSight rTarget == 0 if rTarget.IsInInterior sTemp = $(rTarget.GetParentCell) else sTemp = $(rTarget.GetParentWorldspace) endif else sTemp = $rTarget endif endif if eval sTemp == "<no name>" sTemp = "" endif
SetUIStringAlt ("HUDMainMenu\JVO\JVORect\JVOMarker" + $iIndex + "\_JVOText") $sTemp endif
iIndex += 1
loop
sv_destruct sTemp
end
